addAccountApproveDenyOracle(address,uint.details: Function add an Account Approve/Deny Oracle rule

params._type: type of Oracle Rule --> 0 = restricted; 1 = allowed

returns._0: ruleId position of rule in storage

addPurchaseFeeByVolumeRule(address,uint2.details: Function to add a Token Purchase Fee By Volume rule

returns._0: ruleId position of new rule in array

addTokenMaxBuyVolume(address,uint16,uint.details: Function to add a Token Max Buy Volume rule

params._period: Time period that transactions are accumulated (in hours)
params._supplyPercentage: Percentage of Tokens allowed to purchase
params._totalSupply: total supply of tokens (0 if using total supply from the token contract)

returns._0: ruleId position of new rule in array

addTokenMaxPriceVolatility(address,uint1.details: Function to add a Token Max Price Volatility rule

params._period: period in hours for the rule

returns._0: ruleId position of new rule in array

addTokenMaxSellVolume(address,uint16,uin.details: Function to add a Token Max Sell Volume rule

params._period: Time period that transactions are frozen
params._supplyPercentage: Percent of Tokens allowed to sell
params._totalSupply: total supply of tokens (0 if using total supply from the token contract)

returns._0: ruleId position of new rule in array

addTokenMaxSupplyVolatility(address,uint.details: Function Token Max Supply Volatility rules

params._maxPercentage: Maximum amount of change allowed. This is not capped and will allow for values greater than 100%. Since there is no cap for _maxPercentage this could allow burning of full totalSupply() if over 100% (10000).
params._startTime: Unix timestamp for the _period to start counting.
params._totalSupply: this is an optional parameter. If 0, the toalSupply will be calculated dyamically. If not zero, this is   going to be the locked value to calculate the rule

returns._0: ruleId position of new rule in array

addTokenMaxTradingVolume(address,uint24,.details: Function to add a Token max trading Volume rules

params._maxPercentage: Maximum allowed volume percentage (this is 4 digits to allow 2 decimal places)
params._totalSupply: Circulating supply value to use in calculations. If not specified, defaults to ERC20 totalSupply

returns._0: ruleId position of new rule in array

addTokenMinTxSize(address,uint256).details: Function to add Token Min Tx Size rules

params._minSize: Mimimum amount of tokens required for transfer

returns._0: ruleId position of new rule in array

getPurchaseFeeByVolumeRule(uint32).details: Function get Token PurchaseFeeByVolume Rule by index

getTokenMaxPriceVolatility(uint32).details: Function get Token Volatility Rule by index

getTotalTokenMaxPriceVolatility().details: Function to get total Volatility rules

getTotalTokenPurchaseFeeByVolumeRules().details: Function to get total Token Purchase Percentage
